title: ‘Every Man We Killed Is a Gangster’: On the Front Lines with Haiti’s Vigilantes
description: Government commissioner Jean Ernest Muscadin’s official duties are to prosecute crimes — but he’s been accused of summarily killing dozens of purported gang members himself
content: A beat-up truck with dark windows and no license plates pulls into the main market of Miragoâne, a hardworking coastal town in Haiti’s southern peninsula. The no-nonsense government commissioner, Jea… [+46650 chars]
